snippet: The Commerce Department said on Wednesday that the deficit in the current account rose to $100.3 billion in the third quarter, up 1.9 percent.
abstract: Commerce Dept says current-account trade deficit rose to $100.3 billion in third quarter 2014, up 1.9 percent from revised $98.4 billion deficit in April-June period.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said on Wednesday that the deficit in the current account rose to $100.3 billion in the third quarter, up 1.9 percent.

headline.main: U.S. Trade Deficit Widened Over Summer
headline.print_headline: U.S. Trade Deficit Widened Over Summer
